import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import "./index.css"; import bg from "../../assets/zebra-bushveld-unsplash.jpg"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import FormHook from '../../utils/form-hook'; import { handleFormValidation } from '../../utils/functions'; const AuthPage = (props:any) => { let navigate = useNavigate(); const formHook = FormHook({email:"", password: ""},'login') return (

handleFormValidation( e.currentTarget.type, e.currentTarget.value, e.currentTarget.required ) ? e.currentTarget.setCustomValidity( 'Email ' + handleFormValidation( e.currentTarget.type, e.currentTarget.value, e.currentTarget.required ) ) : e.currentTarget.setCustomValidity('') } onChange={formHook.handleInputChange} pattern='^([a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\.]+)@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,4}|[0-9]{1,3})(\]?)' className="w-full px-3 py-2 leading-tight text-gray-700 border rounded shadow appearance-none focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" id="username" type="text" placeholder="Username" />
handleFormValidation( e.currentTarget.type, e.currentTarget.value, e.currentTarget.required ) ? e.currentTarget.setCustomValidity( 'Password ' + handleFormValidation( e.currentTarget.type, e.currentTarget.value, e.currentTarget.required ) ) : e.currentTarget.setCustomValidity('') } onChange={formHook.handleInputChange} className="w-full px-3 py-2 mb-3 leading-tight text-gray-700 border border-red-500 rounded shadow appearance-none focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" id="password" type="password" placeholder="******************" />
